EmailTemplate.name: Course Assignment Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: NCT Course assignment for {!Course_Assignment__c.PSA_Area__c}/{!Course_Assignment__c.Course__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Course_Assignment__c.OwnerFirstName}, {!ApprovalRequest.Comments} Please log in to the Practitioner community to review and sign this assignment. King Regards, {!Course_Assignment__c.CreatedBy} Course Organazer
